attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All young offenders who face court for the third time and obviously not adjusting to their responsible role in the community , automatically go into army service  and given an apprenticeship  for four years and re assessed  / supported on discharge  .

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
